mapper.select: select hm.id,hm.content,hm.contactId,u.nickname as contactName,u.avatar as contactAvatar,hm.time,u.role as userName from User u join HeadMessage hm on u.id = hm.contactId where hm.userId = #{userId} union select hm.id,hm.content,hm.contactId,g.name as contactName,g.avatar as contactAvatar,hm.time, ( select u.nickname from User u join GroupMessageRecord mr on u.id = mr.memberId join ChatMessage cm on cm.id = mr.messageId where mr.selfRecord = 1 order by cm.time desc limit 1 ) as userName from UserGroup g join HeadMessage hm on g.id = hm.contactId join User u on u.id = hm.userId where hm.userId = #{userId}
